content:
I've been doing a lot of reading and research on the topic, and I'm planning to start by dividing my pasture into smaller sections and rotating Luna through them every few days. I've also been learning about different grazing heights and trying to balance the nutrient intake for optimal health. It's a bit of a learning curve, but I'm excited to see the benefits it'll bring.

By the way, speaking of learning curves, I've only been involved with farm animals for a few months now, and it's been a steep but rewarding journey. I'm loving every minute of it, even the challenges!
